column5: Our Guest House is in the beautiful piney woods of East Texas with breathtaking view of the surrounding hills and valleys. You have to experience it to believe it. In addition to the Guest House you will enjoy a game room/exercise room and our beautiful grounds. It's the perfect getaway for a group of friends or family.  It has a kitchenette with sink, refrigerator, microwave.  There are two full beds, one queen bed and two twin beds.
